articles.title: Apple, Anthropic, and other companies used YouTube videos to train AI - The Verge
articles.description: A dataset of YouTube video subtitles that was used by Apple, Nvidia, and Anthropic to train AI includes material from MrBeast, the BBC, and even The Verge.

articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: Liquid Lakes On Saturn Moon Have Waves And Currents, Scientists Say - Forbes
articles.description: A new study reveals the composition and dynamics of the liquid hydrocarbon seas on Saturn's moon Titan, with implications for NASA's upcoming Dragonfly mission.
articles.content:
Titan is the only moon in the solar system with liquid on its surface and an atmosphere. 
getty
